abstracts.cdata!:
The assessment of outcome is
            satisfactory, sustainability likely, though institutional
            development impacts are only modest. Lessons learned from
            the project experience include: 1) The project provided an
            example of smallholder tree crop development, as an
            appropriate model to promote agricultural development,
            create rural employment, and alleviate poverty, provided the
            scheme is properly designed, and implemented, with an
            acceptable international commodity price. In this context
            however, the experience points at the fact that, in order to
            benefit fully from this model, it is essential that both the
            Government, and project agencies place equal importance on
            complementary initiatives in rural infrastructure, and
            delivery of technical services, and inputs. 2) The
            involvement of a number of components in this project, that
            do not normally pertain to a single government institution,
            needs to ensure effective means of coordinating activities,
            and provide attention to issues that can endanger
            implementation. This coordination was not effective in the
            project, whereas in an earlier oil palm project, the
            existence of a Project Management Committee proved
            successful. 3) To maximize oil palm development along access
            roads, institutional, and funding arrangements need to
            enable their timely construction and maintenance, critical
            to allow fresh fruit collection. 4) In development programs,
            in particular where attitudes, and behavior of smallholders
            needs to be adopted, an effective monitoring capability is
            required, implying the need for a management information
            system, as well as the ability to analyze data, conduct
            surveys, and study work as a basis for corrective action.
